The humor in the image comes from the contrast between the calm and relaxed woman on one side and the uncomfortable stick figures on the other. The text "YES, BUT" suggests a juxtaposition. 

The woman appears comfortable and at ease, possibly enjoying ideal car features like heating or air conditioning. In contrast, one stick figure shivers, possibly indicating they are cold, while the other sweats, suggesting they are hot. This exaggeration humorously highlights how different people can have vastly different experiences in the same environment, often due to climate control settings within a car.
